    LorentzVectors.LorentzVector — Type.
    LorentzVector(t, x, y, z)

    Lorentz 4-vector, as used in Special Relativity.

    The metric convention is g = diag(+1,-1,-1,-1). No distinction is made between co- and contravariant vectors.

    LorentzVectors.LorentzVectors
    LorentzVectors.SpatialVector — Type.
    SpatialVector(x, y, z)

    Spatial part of a Lorentz 4-vector.

    LorentzVectors.Vec3 — Type.

    Alias of SpatialVector

    LorentzVectors.Vec4 — Type.

    Alias of LorentzVector

    LorentzVectors.boost
    LinearAlgebra.dot — Function.
    dot(u, v)
u⋅v

    Inner product of 4-vectors, in the Minkowsky metric (+,-,-,-).
